name: Temporal AI - Critical Success Rate Drop
description: Critical alert when pattern success rate drops below 30% - immediate attention required
query: SELECT pattern_id, ROUND(success_rate * 100, 1) as success_pct, ROUND(error_rate * 100, 1) as error_pct, recommendation_count FROM temporal_ai_recommendations WHERE success_rate < 0.3 AND recommendation_count > 5
